Example 2.31
```{r}
probspace<-expand.grid(o1=9:11,o2=19:21)
require(dplyr)
probspace<-mutate(probspace,X=o1+o2,P=1/nrow(probspace))
probspace
by_X<-group_by(probspace,X)
example2_31<-summarize(by_X,P=sum(P))
example2_31
```
